page.title: 18...TRANSPORT
page.content: The M6 motorway,elevated on concrete pillars,passes through the block. The nearest junctions are at Gravelly Hill and Castle Bromwich. The Birmingham to Derby railway line runs below the motorway.The nearest stations are at Water Orton and Birmingham,New Street.Scheduled passenger aircraft approach the airport from Ireland and Scotland.Others are European charter flights. Eleven bus routes pass through the block.One follows the outer ring road. The others link the city centre and suburbs.Many families own cars.More than half also use local buses frequently.A Light Rapid Transit facility using electric trams is planned between Castle Bromwich and the city centre,operating from 1992.It is strongly opposed locally.
